TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDependency extends System.Object

summary.span: 对象表示应用程序和 SQL Server 实例间的查询通知依赖关系。

span.span: The object represents a query notification dependency between an application and an instance of SQL Server.

summary.span: 应用程序可以创建一个 对象并进行注册以通过 事件处理程序接收通知。

span.span: An application can create a object and register to receive notifications via the event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非常适合于缓存的方案，在 ASP.NET 应用程序或中间层服务需要将某些信息缓存在内存中。 is ideal for caching scenarios, where your ASP.NET application or middle-tier service needs to keep certain information cached in memory. 可以在数据库中的原始数据更改，以便可以刷新缓存时接收通知。 allows you to receive notifications when the original data in the database changes so that the cache can be refreshed. 若要设置依赖项，你需要将关联到一个或多个对象对象。To set up a dependency, you need to associate a object to one or more objects. 若要接收通知，你需要订阅事件。To receive notifications, you need to subscribe to the event. 有关创建查询通知的要求的详细信息，请参阅"创建查询的通知"SQL Server 联机丛书中。For more information about the requirements for creating queries for notifications, see "Creating a Query for Notification" in SQL Server Books Online. > [!NOTE] > 设计为在 ASP.NET 或中间层服务中使用较少的服务器上有依赖项针对数据库处于活动状态的情况。 was designed to be used in ASP.NET or middle-tier services where there is a relatively small number of servers having dependencies active against the database. 它不是针对在客户端应用程序，将具有数百或数千个客户端计算机中使用为单个数据库服务器设置的对象。It was not designed for use in client applications, where hundreds or thousands of client computers would have objects set up for a single database server. 如果你正在开发应用程序数据发生更改时需要可靠的次秒通知，查看部分**规划高效的查询通知策略**和**查询的替代方法通知**中[规划通知](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=211984)SQL Server 联机丛书中的主题。If you are developing an application where you need reliable sub-second notifications when data changes, review the sections **Planning an Efficient Query Notifications Strategy** and **Alternatives to Query Notifications** in the [Planning for Notifications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=211984) topic in SQL Server Books Online. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 中的查询通知](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md)和 SQL Server 联机丛书中的"生成通知解决方案"。For more information, see [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server.md) and "Building Notification Solutions" in SQL Server Books Online. > [!NOTE] > 可能在不同线程从启动命令执行的线程生成事件。The event may be generated on a different thread from the thread that initiated command execution. 仅对满足一系列特定需求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 下表提供指向“SQL Server 联机丛书”中的 Service Broker 和“查询通知”文档的链接。The following table provides links to the Service Broker and Query Notifications documentation in SQL Server Books Online. **SQL Server 联机丛书****SQL Server Books Online** - [为通知创建查询Creating a Query for Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [Service Broker 的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [安全和保护 (Service Broker)Security and Protection (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [通知服务的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Notifications Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [查询通知权限Query Notification Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [Service Broker 的国际化注意事项International Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [解决方案设计注意事项 (Service Broker)Solution Design Considerations (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker 开发人员信息中心Service Broker Developer InfoCenter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [开发人员指南 (Service Broker)Developer's Guide (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)

summary.span: 用默认设置创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化对象使用默认 Service Broker 服务名称和超时。在构造之后的某个位置，你必须使用方法将一个或多个命令与此关联起来对象。The constructor initializes the object using the default Service Broker service name and time-out. At some point after construction, you must use the method to associate one or more commands to this object. 仅对满足一系列特定需求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 下表提供指向“SQL Server 联机丛书”中的 Service Broker 和“查询通知”文档的链接。The following table provides links to the Service Broker and Query Notifications documentation in SQL Server Books Online. **SQL Server 联机丛书****SQL Server Books Online** - [为通知创建查询Creating a Query for Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [Service Broker 的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [安全和保护 (Service Broker)Security and Protection (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [通知服务的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Notifications Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [查询通知权限Query Notification Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [Service Broker 的国际化注意事项International Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [解决方案设计注意事项 (Service Broker)Solution Design Considerations (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker 开发人员信息中心Service Broker Developer InfoCenter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [开发人员指南 (Service Broker)Developer's Guide (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建的实例的内部，类，并将其绑定到对象。Internally, this constructor creates an instance of the class, and binds it to a object. 仅对满足一系列特定需求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 下表提供指向“SQL Server 联机丛书”中的 Service Broker 和“查询通知”文档的链接。The following table provides links to the Service Broker and Query Notifications documentation in SQL Server Books Online. **SQL Server 联机丛书****SQL Server Books Online** - [为通知创建查询Creating a Query for Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [Service Broker 的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [安全和保护 (Service Broker)Security and Protection (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [通知服务的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Notifications Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [查询通知权限Query Notification Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [Service Broker 的国际化注意事项International Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [解决方案设计注意事项 (Service Broker)Solution Design Considerations (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker 开发人员信息中心Service Broker Developer InfoCenter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [开发人员指南 (Service Broker)Developer's Guide (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅对满足一系列特定需求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 下表提供指向“SQL Server 联机丛书”中的 Service Broker 和“查询通知”文档的链接。The following table provides links to the Service Broker and Query Notifications documentation in SQL Server Books Online. **SQL Server 联机丛书****SQL Server Books Online** - [为通知创建查询Creating a Query for Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [Service Broker 的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [安全和保护 (Service Broker)Security and Protection (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [通知服务的安全注意事项Security Considerations for Notifications Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [查询通知权限Query Notification Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [Service Broker 的国际化注意事项International Considerations for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [解决方案设计注意事项 (Service Broker)Solution Design Considerations (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker 开发人员信息中心Service Broker Developer InfoCenter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [开发人员指南 (Service Broker)Developer's Guide (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)

MemberSignature.Value: public bool HasChanges { get; }
.property instance bool HasChanges
Public ReadOnly Property HasChanges As Boolean
public: property bool HasChanges { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与依赖项关联的结果集之一是否已经更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether one of the result sets associated with the dependency has changed.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示结果集之一是否已经更改。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether one of the result sets has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你不使用事件，你可以检查属性来确定查询结果是否已更改。If you are not using the event, you can check the property to determine if the query results have changed. 属性不一定意味着数据中的更改。The property does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情况下，例如超时过期，失败要设置通知请求中，也会生成更改事件。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate a change event.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Id { get; }
.property instance string Id
Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值唯一标识 类的此实例。

span.span: Gets a value that uniquely identifies this instance of the class.

value.span: GUID 的字符串表示，为 类的每个实例都生成。

span.span: A string representation of a GUID that is generated for each instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于唯一标识给定实例。The property is used to uniquely identify a given instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler OnChange;
.event class System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler OnChange
Public Custom Event OnChange As OnChangeEventHandler
public: event System::Data::SqlClient::OnChangeEventHandler ^ OnChange;

summary.span: 当收到与此 对象关联的任意命令的通知时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a notification is received for any of the commands associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当关联命令的结果更改时发生。 occurs when the results for the associated command change. 如果你不使用，你可以检查属性来确定查询结果是否已更改。If you are not using , you can check the property to determine whether the query results have changed. 事件不一定意味着数据中的更改。The event does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情况下，超时到期时，以及失败要设置通知请求中，也会生成。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate .

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 SQL Server 连接中发生错误时，将重新启动侦听器。The listener will restart when an error occurs in the SQL Server connection. 多次调用方法可以进行，但应受到以下限制：Multiple calls to the method can be made, subject to the following restrictions: - 使用相同的参数 （相同的连接字符串和 Windows 凭据，调用线程） 的多个调用都有效。Multiple calls with identical parameters (the same connection string and Windows credentials in the calling thread) are valid. - 使用不同的连接字符串的多个调用都有效，只要：Multiple calls with different connection strings are valid as long as: - 每个连接字符串指定不同的数据库，或Each connection string specifies a different database, or - 每个连接字符串指定不同的用户，或Each connection string specifies a different user, or - 在调用来自不同应用程序域。The calls come from different application domains. 你可以工作正常的应用程序使用多个线程来表示不同的用户凭据，而无需授予 dbo 角色到的组，因为不同的用户可以订阅和侦听 (使用或)到由管理员创建的通知队列。You can make the work correctly for applications that use multiple threads to represent different user credentials without giving the dbo role to the group, because different users can subscribe and listen (using or ) to a notification queue created by an administrator. 相关的应用程序域在启动时，请使用具有初始化 service/队列 （创建队列和创建服务数据库的权限） 的权限的用户 (Windows) 凭据调用开始。When the relevant application domain starts, call Start with the (Windows) credentials of a user that has permission to initialize a service/queue (the CREATE QUEUE and CREATE SERVICE permissions for the database). 确保仅调用 Start 后每 AppDomain 中，否则多义性引发异常。Ensure that Start is only called once per AppDomain, otherwise an ambiguity exception is raised. 用户线程必须有权订阅通知 （数据库订阅查询通知权限）。The user thread must have permission to subscribe to the notification (the SUBSCRIBE QUERY NOTIFICATIONS permission for the database). 会将关联到由管理员创建的服务/队列的非管理员用户订阅请求。 will associate the subscription request of a non-administrator user to the service/queue created by the administrator.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Start (string connectionString);
.method public static hidebysig bool Start(string connectionString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Start (connectionString As String) As Boolean
public: static bool Start(System::String ^ connectionString);

param.name: connectionString
param.span: SQL Server 实例（从中获取更改通知）的连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string for the instance of SQL Server from which to obtain change notifications.

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器，该通知来自由连接字符串指定的 SQL Server 实例。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string.

returns.span: 如果侦听器初始化成功，则为 true；如果已存在兼容的侦听器，则为 false。

span.span: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会启动的侦听器用于接收从指定的 SQL server 实例的依赖项通知`connectionString`参数。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 调用此方法可能会多次使用不同的连接字符串为多个服务器。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 有关其他的备注，请参阅。For additional remarks, see .

exception.span: 参数为 NULL。

span.span: The parameter is NULL.

exception.span: 与上次调用此方法相比， 参数相同，但其他参数不同。

span.span: The parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.

exception.span: 此方法是从 CLR 内部调用的。

span.span: The method was called from within the CLR.

exception.span: 调用方没有所必需的 代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 随后调用了该方法，调用使用等效的 参数和不同的用户，或者不是同一架构的默认用户的用户。

span.span: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent parameter with a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.

exception.span: 还有所有基础 SqlClient 异常。

span.span: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Start (string connectionString, string queue);
.method public static hidebysig bool Start(string connectionString, string queue) cil managed
Public Shared Function Start (connectionString As String, queue As String) As Boolean
public: static bool Start(System::String ^ connectionString, System::String ^ queue);

param.name: connectionString
param.span: SQL Server 实例（从中获取更改通知）的连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string for the instance of SQL Server from which to obtain change notifications.

param.name: queue
param.span: 要使用的现有 SQL Server Service Broker 队列。

span.span: An existing SQL Server Service Broker queue to be used.

param.span: 如果为 ，则使用默认队列。

span.span: If , the default queue is used.

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器，该侦听器使用指定的 SQL Server Service Broker 队列从由连接字符串指定的 SQL Server 实例接收。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string using the specified SQL Server Service Broker queue.

returns.span: 如果侦听器初始化成功，则为 true；如果已存在兼容的侦听器，则为 false。

span.span: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会启动的侦听器用于接收从指定的 SQL server 实例的依赖项通知`connectionString`参数。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 调用此方法可能会多次使用不同的连接字符串为多个服务器。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 如果不指定任何队列名称，则在的服务器上用于整个过程中，创建一个临时队列和服务，即使过程涉及多个。If no queue name is specified, creates a temporary queue and service in the server that is used for the entire process, even if the process involves more than one . 队列和服务会自动删除应用程序关闭时。The queue and service are automatically removed upon application shutdown. 有关其他的备注，请参阅。For additional remarks, see .

span.span: The parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.

exception.span: 调用方没有所必需的 代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 已经随后调用了该方法，调用使用等效的 参数和不同的用户，或者不是同一架构的默认用户的用户。

span.span: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent parameter but a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.

exception.span: 还有所有基础 SqlClient 异常。

span.span: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.

summary.span: 停止在上一次 调用中指定的连接的侦听器。

span.span: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 SQL Server 连接中发生错误时，将重新启动侦听器。The listener will restart when an error occurs in the SQL Server connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Stop (string connectionString);
.method public static hidebysig bool Stop(string connectionString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Stop (connectionString As String) As Boolean
public: static bool Stop(System::String ^ connectionString);

param.name: connectionString
param.span: SQL Server 实例的连接字符串，在上一次 调用中使用。

span.span: Connection string for the instance of SQL Server that was used in a previous call.

summary.span: 停止在上一次 调用中指定的连接的侦听器。

span.span: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous call.

returns.span: 如果侦听器完全停止，则为 true；如果 从侦听器解除绑定，但至少还有另一个 使用同一侦听器，则为 false。

span.span: **true** if the listener was completely stopped; **false** if the was unbound from the listener, but there are is at least one other using the same listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必须为每个调用调用。The method must be called for each call. 给定的侦听器只能关闭完全当接收相同数量的请求作为请求。A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of requests as requests.

exception.span: 参数为 NULL。

span.span: The parameter is NULL.

exception.span: 此方法是从 SQLCLR 内部调用的。

span.span: The method was called from within SQLCLR.

exception.span: 调用方没有所必需的 代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 发生基础 SqlClient 异常。

span.span: An underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
